name: Python 3 with gcloud (Debugging)
postCreateCommand: set -e && set -x && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates gnupg git-lfs && echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg] https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt cloud-sdk main" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-cloud-sdk.list && sudo curl https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | sudo apt-key add - && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-cloud-cli && echo 'export PATH="$PATH:/usr/lib/google-cloud-sdk/bin"' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc && pip install --user -r requirements.txt || true && echo 'gcloud installation check:' && gcloud --version && echo 'postCreateCommand finished successfully.'
